task.title: Swap Shifts
task.shortdesc: Employees can swap shifts with coworkers when they need to modify their own schedule. They can view all shifts on the schedule and see which ones can be switched between available employees. Only a single shift can be swapped at a time. Also, shift swaps display any time off requests.

step.cmd: Find and select the date with the work shift to give away or swap.
In the pop-up window, select Request Change to open the Request Schedule Change page.
Select whether to give the shift away to another employee, give the shift away and change its status to "unassigned," or swap the shift with another employee.
Select an eligible employee from the list or select the Any Coworker option. If the Any Coworker option is selected, select either Accept First Offer or Let Me Choose.
Select the shifts you want to swap for; you can select Filter Shifts to exclude certain days.
Enter any comments and select Request Change.

From the navigation pane, select Change Requests. On the Change Requests page, you can act on any requests other employees have sent you and view your pending request statuses and completed requests. If you select View next to one of your requests, you can view details about the request or cancel it.
step.info: If manager approval is required, when an employee accepts a shift swap request, the manager for both employees receives a request. After the manager approves or rejects the swap, notifications are automatically sent to both employees. If the request was approved, the shift then appears in that employee's view of the Team Schedule page. Approved swapped shifts are posted to the schedule.

info.note: The Any Coworker option and manager approval are enabled when an administrator creates or edits your scheduling team.
